articles.title: Measles: First case in seven years confirmed in Northern Ireland - BBC.com
articles.description: This is the first case of measles to be diagnosed in Northern Ireland for seven years.

articles.author: Katherine Lewin
articles.title: NodThera touts potential weight loss effect of NLRP3 inhibitors - Endpoints News
articles.description: NodThera is moving its NLRP3 inhibitors into the clinic after preclinical data showed it reversed obesity and inflammation in mice in a study that compared it against Novo Nordisk’s Wegovy. In the trial, mice receiving NT-0796, NodThera’s lead candidate, lost…
articles.content: NodThera is mov­ing its NL­RP3 in­hibitors in­to the clin­ic af­ter pre­clin­i­cal da­ta showed it re­versed obe­si­ty and in­flam­ma­tion in mice in a study that com­pared it against No­vo Nordisk’s… [+446 chars]

articles.title: New fasting-like diet could reverse your biological age, study claims - BBC Science Focus
articles.description: New research shows that mimicking a fast for five days a month could reduce your risk of disease and keep you biologically younger.
articles.content: Move over intermittent fasting, the Atkins diet, the Dukan diet, keto, paleo, vegan, Mediterranean and all the rest there's a new way of eating on the block which can not only make you healthier but … [+4131 chars]

articles.title: Quarter-million genomes analyzed in NIH project could be 'hugely important' for identifying disease risks - Science
